data_entries.content_kr:
﻿학년,과목명,영문명,설명
1학년,파이썬기초및실습,Python Programming and Practice,컴퓨터 프로그래밍에 대한 기본 개념을 이해하고 이를 기반으로 기본적인 파이썬 프로그래밍의 습득을 통해 컴퓨터프로그래밍에 대한 이해와 컴퓨터적 사고능력을 가질 수 있도록 한다.
1학년,확률통계개론,Introduction to Probability and Statistics,인공지능 영역에 자주 사용되는 기본 확률 및 통계 개념을 소개하고 기계/딥러닝 모델을 만드는 데 유용한 확률과 통계의 입문 부분을 학습한다.
1학년,논리적문제해결,Logical Problem Solving,문제해결능력 향상을 위해 문제분석 및 해결을 위한 다양한 framework와 logic tree를 학습한다.
1학년,영상이해,Image Processing,"Digital Signal Processing과 디지털 필터를 이해하고, 이미지 및 소리의 디지털 신호처리와 푸리에 변환에 대해 학습한다."
1학년,인공지능기초와활용,Foundation and Utilization of Artificial Intelligence,인공지능의 역사와 기초 지식을 비롯하여 다양한 분야의 활용을 배운다.
1학년,인공지능수학기초,Artificial Intelligence Early Semester,인공지능에서 자주 사용되는 선형대수의 기본 개념을 소개한다.
2학년,기계학습,Machine Learning,"기계학습의 기본 개념과 알고리즘을 배우며, 지도학습, 비지도학습, 앙상블 모델을 포함한 기계학습의 기본 이론을 학습한다."
2학년,딥러닝,Deep Learning,딥러닝의 배경지식과 Convolutional 및 Recurrent Neural Networks와 관련된 지식과 활용법을 실습한다.
2학년,AI알고리즘,AI Algorithm,"최적화 관련 알고리즘을 학습하며, 인공지능에서 최적의 솔루션을 찾기 위한 다양한 기법을 배운다."
2학년,데이터분석기초,Data Analysis Basics,"데이터 분석의 기초를 다루며, 주요 오픈소스 라이브러리(numpy, matplotlib, pandas)를 학습하여 활용능력을 키운다."
2학년,리눅스운영체제,Linux Operating System,"Linux 운영체제의 기본 개념과 주요 기능을 이해하며 프로세스 관리, 저장장치 관리 등의 주제를 학습한다."
2학년,문제해결과알고리즘,Problem Solving Algorithm,스토리 문제 해결을 위한 알고리즘을 학습하여 절차적 문제 해결 능력을 키운다.
2학년,서비스러닝,Service Learning,"학습한 이론을 실제 기업 프로젝트에 적용하여 실무 경험을 획득하고, 문제 해결능력을 배양한다."
2학년,인공지능수학심화,Advanced Artificial Intelligence Mathematics,확률 및 통계와 같은 인공지능 기술 개발을 위한 수학 이론과 기법을 학습한다.
2학년,프로그래밍기초와실습,Basic Programming and Practice,자바를 사용하여 객체지향 프로그래밍의 기초와 소프트웨어 개발 능력을 배양한다.
3학년,AI리빙랩Ⅰ,AI Living LabⅠ,전공지식을 지역사회의 문제 해결에 적용하며 실제 문제 해결능력을 키운다.
3학년,강화학습,Reinforced Learning,기계 학습 및 인공지능의 핵심 연구 분야인 강화학습을 학습하고 응용한다.
3학년,데이터베이스,Database,"데이터베이스의 개념과 질의어, 정규화 및 객체지향 데이터베이스에 대해 학습한다."
3학년,로봇프로그래밍기초,Basic Robot Programming,"로봇 제어에 필요한 AI 개념, 센서 데이터 수집 및 처리 등을 학습한다."
3학년,비지도학습,Unsupervised Learning,"비지도학습을 통해 차원축소, 군집화 등 목표값 없는 데이터의 숨겨진 구조를 학습한다."
3학년,웹프로그래밍,Web Programming,"HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, 파이썬 등을 활용하여 웹프로그래밍 환경을 구축한다."
3학년,유전 알고리즘,Genetic Algorithm,유전 알고리즘 및 타부서치를 통해 최적화 문제를 해결하는 방법을 학습한다.
3학년,자연어처리,Natural Language Processing,Python과 NLTK를 기반으로 NLP의 기본 개념과 기법을 학습한다.
3학년,첨단신경망,Advanced Neural Network,딥 러닝의 최근 발전을 반영한 고급 신경망 모델 및 응용 프로그램을 다룬다.
3학년,클라우드컴퓨팅,Cloud Computing,가상화를 포함한 클라우드 컴퓨팅 개념을 학습하고 다양한 클라우드 형태의 운영 시스템을 학습한다.
4학년,AI리빙랩Ⅱ,AI Living LabⅡ,지역사회의 문제 해결에 전공지식을 적용하여 실무적 문제 해결능력을 배양한다.
4학년,음성인식,Voice Recognition,"AI 음성인식의 개념과 통계, 디지털 신호처리에 대해 학습한다."
4학년,인공지능세미나,Artificial Intelligence Seminar,인공지능의 특수 주제와 관련 분야의 최신 개발 및 동향을 학습한다.
4학년,인공지능시스템,Artificial Intelligence System,인공지능 시스템을 실제로 구현하여 학문적 이해를 심화한다.
4학년,지능HCI,Intelligence HCI,인간과 컴퓨터 간의 상호작용을 개선하는 HCI 기술을 학습한다.
4학년,지식표현과추론,Knowledge Expression and Reasoning,컴퓨터와 인간이 이해할 수 있는 논리적 표현법과 추론 기법을 학습한다.
data_entries.content:
학년,과목명,영문명,설명  
1학년,파이썬기초및실습,Python Programming and Practice,Understand the basic concepts of computer programming and acquire basic Python programming skills to develop an understanding of computer programming and computational thinking abilities.  
1학년,확률통계개론,Introduction to Probability and Statistics,Introduce basic probability and statistics concepts commonly used in artificial intelligence and learn the introductory aspects of probability and statistics useful for creating machine/deep learning models.  
1학년,논리적문제해결,Logical Problem Solving,Learn various frameworks and logic trees for problem analysis and resolution to enhance problem-solving skills.  
1학년,영상이해,Image Processing,"Understand Digital Signal Processing and digital filters, and learn about digital signal processing of images and sounds, as well as Fourier transforms."  
1학년,인공지능기초와활용,Foundation and Utilization of Artificial Intelligence,Learn about the history of artificial intelligence and its basic knowledge, along with applications in various fields.  
1학년,인공지능수학기초,Artificial Intelligence Early Semester,Introduce the basic concepts of linear algebra commonly used in artificial intelligence.  
2학년,기계학습,Machine Learning,"Learn the basic concepts and algorithms of machine learning, including supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and ensemble models."  
2학년,딥러닝,Deep Learning,Practice the background knowledge of deep learning and the knowledge and applications related to Convolutional and Recurrent Neural Networks.  
2학년,AI알고리즘,AI Algorithm,"Learn optimization-related algorithms and various techniques for finding optimal solutions in artificial intelligence."  
2학년,데이터분석기초,Data Analysis Basics,"Cover the basics of data analysis and learn to utilize major open-source libraries (numpy, matplotlib, pandas) to enhance practical skills."  
2학년,리눅스운영체제,Linux Operating System,"Understand the basic concepts and main features of the Linux operating system, learning topics such as process management and storage management."  
2학년,문제해결과알고리즘,Problem Solving Algorithm,Learn algorithms for solving story problems to enhance procedural problem-solving abilities.  
2학년,서비스러닝,Service Learning,"Apply learned theories to real corporate projects to gain practical experience and cultivate problem-solving skills."  
2학년,인공지능수학심화,Advanced Artificial Intelligence Mathematics,Learn mathematical theories and techniques for developing artificial intelligence technologies, such as probability and statistics.  
2학년,프로그래밍기초와실습,Basic Programming and Practice,Develop the basics of object-oriented programming and software development skills using Java.  
3학년,AI리빙랩Ⅰ,AI Living LabⅠ,Apply major knowledge to solve community problems and enhance practical problem-solving abilities.  
3학년,강화학습,Reinforced Learning,Learn and apply reinforcement learning, a core research area in machine learning and artificial intelligence.  
3학년,데이터베이스,Database,"Learn the concepts of databases, query languages, normalization, and object-oriented databases."  
3학년,로봇프로그래밍기초,Basic Robot Programming,"Learn AI concepts necessary for robot control, sensor data collection, and processing."  
3학년,비지도학습,Unsupervised Learning,"Learn the hidden structures of unlabeled data through unsupervised learning, including dimensionality reduction and clustering."  
3학년,웹프로그래밍,Web Programming,"Build a web programming environment using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Python."  
3학년,유전 알고리즘,Genetic Algorithm,Learn methods to solve optimization problems through genetic algorithms and tabu search.  
3학년,자연어처리,Natural Language Processing,Learn the basic concepts and techniques of NLP based on Python and NLTK.  
3학년,첨단신경망,Advanced Neural Network,Cover advanced neural network models and applications reflecting recent developments in deep learning.  
3학년,클라우드컴퓨팅,Cloud Computing,Learn the concepts of cloud computing, including virtualization, and study various types of cloud operating systems.  
4학년,AI리빙랩Ⅱ,AI Living LabⅡ,Apply major knowledge to solve community problems and cultivate practical problem-solving abilities.  
4학년,음성인식,Voice Recognition,"Learn the concepts of AI voice recognition, statistics, and digital signal processing."  
4학년,인공지능세미나,Artificial Intelligence Seminar,Study special topics in artificial intelligence and the latest developments and trends in related fields.  
4학년,인공지능시스템,Artificial Intelligence System,Implement artificial intelligence systems to deepen academic understanding.  
4학년,지능H
data_entries.summary: The CSV content outlines a curriculum for a four-year program focused on artificial intelligence and programming, detailing various courses offered each year. In the first year, students learn foundational programming skills, probability, statistics, and basic concepts of artificial intelligence. The second year builds on these concepts with courses in machine learning, deep learning, and data analysis, while also introducing Linux and advanced mathematics for AI. The third year includes practical applications through AI living labs, reinforcement learning, and database management, alongside programming skills for web and robotics. Finally, the fourth year emphasizes advanced topics such as voice recognition, AI systems, and seminars on current trends in artificial intelligence.

data_entries.content_kr:
[답변] 지능정보의 혁명이라고 하는 4차 산업혁명 시대의 핵심은 인공지능입니다. 인공지능은 현재와 미래의 핵심기술 중 하나이며, 산업과 사회 전반에 걸쳐 큰 변화를 가져올 것으로 예상됩니다. 기존의 컴퓨터와 같이 인공지능은 모든 분야에서 필수적인 기술이 되고 있기 때문에 인공지능을 배우는 것은 학생들이 미래에 일할 분야에서 경쟁력을 갖추기 위해 필수적입니다.

[답변] 인공지능학과는 컴퓨터 공학과에서 출발하였습니다. 그래서 서로 많이 유사합니다만, 교육 중점방향이 다소 다릅니다. 컴퓨터 공학과는 일반적인 프로그램 개발자를 양성한다면, 인공지능학과는 최근 관심이 뜨거운 빅데이터 분석, 머신러닝, 딥러닝으로 대표되는 인공지능 전문 개발자를 양성합니다. 4차 산업혁명 시대의 핵심인 인공지능 기술은 빠르게 성장하고 있으며 산업 현장에서 좋은 대우와 많은 기회를 제공하고 있습니다.

[답변] 저희 학과는 2021년도 교육부에서 첨단학과로 지정되어 신설된 학과로서, 인공지능에 관련된 전문적인 교육과 연구를 수행하기 위해 설립되었습니다. 저희 학과는 전북권 유일의 인공지능 전문학과로서, AI 관련 다양한 전문경력을 보유한 최고의 교수진으로 구성되어 있으며 AI를 가장 체계적이고 재밌게 배우는 교육 프로그램을 운영하고 있습니다. 따라서 인공지능에 대해 전문적으로 배우고 싶다면, 전주대 인공지능학과는 매우 적합한 선택임을 확신합니다.

[답변] 저희 학과는 “AI를 직접 보고 느끼며 재미있고 쉽게 배운다.”를 교육모토(Motto)로 삼고 있습니다. 전주대 인공지능학과에서는 학생들의 눈높이에 맞춰 인공지능을 가능한 쉽고 재미있게 가르칩니다. 고등학교 때까지 평범하게 공부한 많은 학생들이 이미 저희 학과에 들어와서 만족하며 공부하고 있습니다. 인공지능은 추상적인 개념이 아닌 실체 결과물을 만들어내는 학문입니다. 하나하나 직접 보고 느끼며 차근차근히 공부한다면, 누구라도 할 수 있고 노력한 결과물을 통해 어떠한 분야보다도 재미있고 보람을 느끼며 쉽게 배울 수 있습니다. 또한, 학과에서는 추가적인 학습이 필요한 학생들을 위해 다양한 프로그램이 준비되어 시행되고 있습니다.

[답변] 저희 학과는 전북권에서 유일하게 교육부 주관 첨단분야 혁신융합대학사업(AI분야)을 유치하여 매년 약 15억원 규모의 재정을 지원받습니다. 이를 통해 학생들을 인공지능 전문가로 양성하기 위해 다양한 교육프로그램과 혜택을 제공하고 있습니다. 입학하자마자 개인 노트북과 사물함을 제공하는 것에서부터 별도의 장학금 혜택, 그리고 캐나다, 말레이시아 등 해외연수의 기회 등을 제공하고 있습니다. 이 이외에도 LINC 사업, 대학혁신지원사업 및 커플링 사업 등 다양한 사업을 통해 학생들이 대학생활을 통해 풍부한 경험을 할 수 있도록 교육 프로그램을 제공하고 있습니다.
.
[답변] 저희학과 교육환경시설에는 최첨단 전자칠판, 방송장비 및 녹화시스템, 그리고 고사양 컴퓨터 시스템을 구비하고 있습니다. 2021년도 신설된 이래 교육부 주관 첨단분야 혁신융합대학사업(AI분야) 등의 튼튼한 재정 지원으로 학과전용 강의실을 4개 보유하고 있으며, 지속적으로 확충해 나아갈 예정입니다. 또한, 로봇, 드론 등과 같은 인공지능 교육기자재를 확보하고 있습니다. 기타 자세한 사항은 학과 홈펭이지의 학과안내 > 강의실습시설을 확인해보시기 바랍니다.

[답변] 저희 학과 교육 프로그램의 가장 중요한 특성은 첫째, 재미를 가미한 실습 중심의 교육 프로그램입니다. 각 학년마다 과목별로 재미를 통해 성과를 창출할 수 있도록 커리큘럼을 구성하였습니다. 재미있게 공부하다보면, 실력이 저절로 향상되도록 하는 것입니다. 두 번재는 학생들 간의 협업을 바탕으로 학습문화입니다. 교수가 학생들을 가르치는 것도 중요하지만 학생들 간의 또래문화를 통해 더 많은 것을 배우고 경험합니다. 이를 위해 저희 학과는 입학한 지 얼마 지나지 않아 같은 학년 또는 선후배 간에 매칭을 연결하여 미니동아리처럼 활동할 수 있도록 지원하고 있습니다.

[답변] 교육부 주관 첨단분야 혁신융합대학사업은 디지털 전환, 글로벌 경쟁 심화에 따라 신기술 초격차 확보 및 급증하는 신산업 인력 수요에 대응할 수 있는 국가 수준의 핵심 인재 양성을 위한 사업입니다. 2021년도에 인공지능을 비롯하여 빅데이터, 차세대 반도체, 미래 자동차, 바이오 헬스, 실감미디어, 지능형 로봇, 에너지 신산업 8개 분야에 대한 컨소시엄을 선정하여 각 분야별 약 100억원을 투입하여 운영하고 있습니다. 주요활동으로는 표준화된 교육과정을 개발하여 대학 간 공동 활용하고 산업계와 협업하여 지역 간대학 간 교육격차를 해소하고 국가 수준의 첨단분야 인재를 양성하는 것입니다. 기타 자세한 내용은 한국연구재단 홈페이지에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

[답변] 저희 학과는 2021년도에 신설되어 아직까지 많이 알려져 있지 않은 관계로 특정 학력수준이 정해져 있지는 않고 일반적으로 전주대학교에 입학할 수 있는 수준이면 누구나 입학이 가능한 바닷 속의 진주와 같은 학과입니다. 저희 학과뿐 아니라 모든 인공지능학과를 들어가기 위해서는 가능한 수학이나 프로그래밍 분야를 사전에 준비하시면 큰 도움이 될 수 있습니다.

[답변] 인공지능 분야의 취업 전망은 매우 밝습니다. 현재의 기술 발전과 산업의 변화로 인해 인공지능은 다양한 분야에서 필수적인 역할을 수행하고 있으며, 이에 따라 인공지능 관련 직무와 채용 수요가 계속해서 증가하고 있습니다. 또한, 인공지능 연구 개발에 대한 정부와 기업들의 투자도 증가하고 있습니다. 다양한 인공지능 관련 연구 기관과 스타트업이 설립되고 있으며, 이는 새로운 일자리 창출과 기술 혁신을 촉진하고 있습니다. 인공지능 산업은 기업들이 경쟁력을 유지하고 성장하기 위해 핵심 분야로 인식되고 있으며, 이에 따라 채용 수요도 높아지고 있습니다.

[답변] 전주대에서의 대학생활은 매우 다양하고 풍부한 경험을 제공하여 만족도가 높은 것으로 알려져 있습니다. 전주대학교는 대한민국 전통과 문화의 중심지인 전주의 신도시에 위치해 있어 교통이 편리하고 주변에 각종 편의시설이 잘 갖추어져 있습니다. 또한, 도서관, 학생회관 등 학교시설이 깨끗하고 기숙사 시설이 잘 갖추어져 있습니다. 기타 자세한 내용은 전주대학교 홈페이지를 참고해 주시기 바랍니다.
data_entries.content:
[Response] The core of the Fourth Industrial Revolution, known as the revolution of intelligent information, is artificial intelligence. AI is one of the key technologies of the present and future, and it is expected to bring significant changes across industries and society as a whole. Since AI is becoming an essential technology in all fields, learning about artificial intelligence is crucial for students to gain competitiveness in the areas they will work in the future.

[Response] The Department of Artificial Intelligence originated from the Department of Computer Engineering. While they are quite similar, their educational focus differs somewhat. The Department of Computer Engineering trains general program developers, whereas the Department of Artificial Intelligence trains specialized developers in AI, represented by the currently popular fields of big data analysis, machine learning, and deep learning. AI technology, which is at the core of the Fourth Industrial Revolution, is rapidly growing and offers good treatment and many opportunities in the industrial field.

[Response] Our department was established in 2021 as a newly designated advanced department by the Ministry of Education to conduct specialized education and research related to artificial intelligence. As the only specialized AI department in the Jeonbuk region, we are composed of top faculty members with diverse professional experience in AI and operate an educational program that teaches AI in the most systematic and enjoyable way. Therefore, if you want to learn about artificial intelligence professionally, I am confident that the Jeonju University Department of Artificial Intelligence is a very suitable choice.

[Response] Our department's educational motto is "Learn AI in a fun and easy way by seeing and experiencing it directly." At Jeonju University's Department of Artificial Intelligence, we teach AI in a way that is as easy and enjoyable as possible, tailored to the students' level. Many students who studied normally until high school are already satisfied and studying in our department. Artificial intelligence is a field that produces tangible results, not just abstract concepts. If you study step by step while seeing and experiencing each aspect, anyone can do it, and through the results of their efforts, they can find it more enjoyable and rewarding than in any other field. Additionally, the department offers various programs for students who need extra learning support.

[Response] Our department is the only one in the Jeonbuk region to have secured the Ministry of Education's advanced field innovation convergence university project (in the AI field), receiving about 1.5 billion won annually in funding. Through this, we provide various educational programs and benefits to train students as AI experts. From providing personal laptops and lockers upon admission to offering separate scholarship benefits and opportunities for overseas training in Canada, Malaysia, and more, we ensure that students can gain rich experiences during their university life through various projects such as the LINC project, university innovation support project, and coupling project.

[Response] Our department's educational facilities are equipped with state-of-the-art electronic whiteboards, broadcasting equipment, recording systems, and high-spec computer systems. Since its establishment in 2021, with strong financial support from projects like the Ministry of Education's advanced field innovation convergence university project (in the AI field), we have four dedicated lecture rooms and plan to continuously expand. We also have AI educational equipment such as robots and drones. For more details, please check the department's homepage under Department Information > Lecture and Practice Facilities.

[Response] The most important characteristic of our department's educational program is, first, a fun and practical-centered curriculum. We have structured the curriculum to create outcomes through enjoyment in each subject for every grade. By studying in a fun way, students will naturally improve their skills. The second characteristic is a learning culture based on collaboration among students. While it is important for professors to teach students, students learn and experience much more through peer culture. To support this, our department connects students of the same year or upper and lower grades shortly after enrollment to engage in activities like mini clubs.

[Response] The Ministry of Education's advanced field innovation convergence university project aims to cultivate core talents at the national level that can respond to the demand for new industrial personnel due to digital transformation and intensified global competition, as well as to secure a technological gap in new technologies. In 2021, consortia were selected for eight fields, including artificial intelligence, big data, next-generation semiconductors, future automobiles, bio-health, immersive media, intelligent robots, and energy new industries, with about 10 billion won invested in each field for operation. The main activities include developing standardized curricula for joint use among universities and collaborating with industries to bridge educational gaps between regions and universities, thereby cultivating advanced field talents at the national level. For more details, please check the Korea Research Foundation's website.

[Response] Our department was established in 2021 and is still not widely known, so there is no specific educational level requirement. Generally, anyone who can be admitted to Jeonju University can enter, making it a hidden gem like a pearl in the sea. To enter not only our department but any artificial intelligence department, it
data_entries.summary: The Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University, established in 2021, focuses on specialized education and research in AI, distinguishing itself from the broader field of computer engineering. It aims to equip students with practical skills through a fun and engaging curriculum, emphasizing hands-on learning and collaboration among peers. The department benefits from significant funding and resources, providing students with personal laptops, scholarships, and opportunities for international training. With state-of-the-art facilities and a commitment to producing tangible results, it seeks to cultivate AI experts to meet the demands of the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

교환학생 교류 프로그램 중국 북경의대 - 신청 시기: 11월, 기간: 1~2월, 지원금: 인당 3백만원, 대상 학년: 4학년 캐나다 토론토대학 - 신청 시기: 5월, 기간: 7~8월, 지원금: 인당 8백만원, 대상 학년: 3학년 말레이시아 기술대학(UTM) - 신청 시기: 3월, 기간: 5~7월, 지원금: 인당 5백만원, 대상 학년: 2학년.
학과 내 운영 동아리 아이어즈 - 학기 중 운영, 활동 내용: AI 알고리즘 연구, 참여 학년: 전 학년.
학과 행사 해외 AI프로젝트 교육과정: 일시 - 1~2월, 장소 - 중국 북경의대 (AI학과), 내용 - 중국 북경의대 교수들이 진행하는 의료 분야 AI 프로젝트 중심 교육과정 AI Hands On Steps: 일시 - 학기 중, 장소 - 정부기관/산업체/코엑스, 벡스코, 내용 - AI 관련 공공기관, 산업체 및 대규모 전시회 관람 및 체험 해외 AI·영어연수: 일시 - 7~8월, 장소 - 말레이시아 기술대학 (UTM), 내용 - UTM 교수들로부터 영어 및 AI 교육과정 입과 해외 AI 선도대학 교육과정: 일시 - 7~8월, 장소 - 캐나다 토론토대학, 내용 - 토론토대학 교수들이 진행하는 AI 단기 교육과정.

캐나다 토론토 대학 인공지능 연수 정보 시기: 3학년 여름방학, 기간: 2주, 지원사항: 항공권 비용, 숙박비, 교육비, 일부 식비, 내용: 인공지능 선도대학에서 인공지능 교육(지도학습, 비지도학습, 강화학습 등) 연수.
말레이시아 어학 연수 정보 시기: 2학년 여름방학, 기간: 약 2달, 지원사항: 항공권 비용, 숙박비, 교육비, 일부 식비, 내용: 말레이시아 UTM 대학에서 영어 수업과 현지 학생과의 교류를 통해 어학능력 향상.
data_entries.content:
Exchange Student Program  
China Beijing Medical University  
- Application Period: November  
- Duration: January to February  
- Funding: 3 million KRW per person  
- Target Year: 4th year  

Canada University of Toronto  
- Application Period: May  
- Duration: July to August  
- Funding: 8 million KRW per person  
- Target Year: 3rd year  

Malaysia University of Technology (UTM)  
- Application Period: March  
- Duration: May to July  
- Funding: 5 million KRW per person  
- Target Year: 2nd year  

Departmental Club Activities  
AIERS  
- Operation: During the semester  
- Activities: Research on AI algorithms  
- Participating Years: All years  

Department Events  
Overseas AI Project Curriculum:  
- Date: January to February  
- Location: China Beijing Medical University (AI Department)  
- Content: AI project-focused curriculum conducted by professors from Beijing Medical University in the medical field  

AI Hands-On Steps:  
- Date: During the semester  
- Location: Government agencies/industries/COEX, BEXCO  
- Content: Visits and experiences at public institutions, industries, and large-scale exhibitions related to AI  

Overseas AI and English Training:  
- Date: July to August  
- Location: Malaysia University of Technology (UTM)  
- Content: English and AI curriculum taught by UTM professors  

Overseas AI Leading University Curriculum:  
- Date: July to August  
- Location: Canada University of Toronto  
- Content: Short-term AI curriculum conducted by professors from the University of Toronto  

Canada University of Toronto AI Training Information  
- Period: 3rd year summer vacation  
- Duration: 2 weeks  
- Support: Airfare, accommodation, tuition, and some meal expenses  
- Content: AI training (supervised learning, unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning, etc.) at a leading AI university  

Malaysia Language Training Information  
- Period: 2nd year summer vacation  
- Duration: Approximately 2 months  
- Support: Airfare, accommodation, tuition, and some meal expenses  
- Content: English classes at UTM and language skill improvement through interaction with local students.
data_entries.summary: The exchange student program offers opportunities at three universities: Beijing Medical University in China for 4th-year students with a funding of 3 million KRW, the University of Toronto in Canada for 3rd-year students with 8 million KRW, and the University of Technology Malaysia for 2nd-year students with 5 million KRW. Various departmental activities include research on AI algorithms and events such as an overseas AI project curriculum in China, AI hands-on experiences in local industries, and English training in Malaysia. Additionally, the University of Toronto provides a two-week AI training program during the 3rd-year summer vacation, while UTM offers English classes during the 2nd-year summer vacation, both with support for travel and accommodation expenses.

2025학년도 전형유형별 모집인원 및 전형방법 학생부종합 - 전형명: 학생부종합(일반학생), 모집인원: 8명, 전형방법: 서류 100%, 수능최저학력기준 없음 학생부종합(사회통합) - 모집인원: 1명, 전형방법: 서류 100%, 수능최저학력기준 없음 학생부교과 - 전형명: 학생부교과(일반학생), 모집인원: 20명, 전형방법: 학생부 100%, 수능최저학력기준 없음.

전주대 인공지능학과 다양한 혜택 매학기 장학금 수여, 입학시 전 학생 개인 노트북 대여 (LG gram, Samsung Galaxy Book 등), 말레이시아 UTM 대학 어학 연수 기회, 캐나다 토론토 대학 인공지능 연수 기회, 각종 인공지능 박람회 참여를 통한 관심 분야 통찰, 대형 사물함 지급.

The admission results data for the 2023-2024 academic year may vary each year based on various factors such as competition rates, applicant scores, admission status changes, and reflection ratios. Therefore, this data cannot be used to determine admission eligibility and should only be used as a reference.

2024 Academic Year Admission Results:
Department of Data Engineering - Academic Record (General): Highest 5.1 / Average 6.8 / 70% CUT 7.3, Comprehensive Evaluation (General): Highest 5.9 / Average 6.6 / 70% CUT 6.9
Department of Smart Media - Academic Record (General): Highest 5.1 / Average 6.9 / 70% CUT 7.5, Comprehensive Evaluation (General): Highest 4.6 / Average 5.8 / 70% CUT 6.1
Department of Artificial Intelligence - Academic Record (General): Highest 4.5 / Average 5.6 / 70% CUT 6.1, Comprehensive Evaluation (General): Highest 1.3 / Average 5.9 / 70% CUT 6.7
Department of Computer Engineering - Academic Record (General): Highest 4.2 / Average 5.5 / 70% CUT 6.4, Comprehensive Evaluation (General): Highest 2.5 / Average 5.6 / 70% CUT 6.0.

2025 Academic Year Admission Type and Recruitment Numbers:
Comprehensive Evaluation - Admission Type: Comprehensive Evaluation (General Students), Recruitment Number: 8, Admission Method: Document 100%, No Minimum Academic Standards for College Entrance Exam
Comprehensive Evaluation (Social Integration) - Recruitment Number: 1, Admission Method: Document 100%, No Minimum Academic Standards for College Entrance Exam
Academic Record - Admission Type: Academic Record (General Students), Recruitment Number: 20, Admission Method: Academic Record 100%, No Minimum Academic Standards for College Entrance Exam.

Jeonju University's Department of Artificial Intelligence offers various benefits including scholarships awarded every semester, personal laptop loans for all students upon admission (LG gram, Samsung Galaxy Book, etc.), language training opportunities at UTM University in Malaysia, artificial intelligence training opportunities at the University of Toronto in Canada, insights into areas of interest through participation in various artificial intelligence fairs, and provision of large lockers.
data_entries.summary: The admission results for the 2023-2024 academic year at Jeonju University indicate varying academic records and comprehensive evaluation scores across different departments, with specific cut-off points for admission eligibility. For the 2025 academic year, the university plans to recruit students through comprehensive evaluations and academic records, with no minimum academic standards required for college entrance exams. The Department of Artificial Intelligence offers numerous benefits to its students, including scholarships, laptop loans, international training opportunities, and participation in AI fairs. Overall, the admission data serves as a reference rather than a definitive guide to eligibility.

data_entries.summary: The document provides information about several professors affiliated with an engineering college, detailing their names, positions, office locations, phone numbers, teaching areas, and links to their professional experiences. Professor Kwon Soo-tae serves as the Vice President for Education, focusing on AI algorithms and machine learning, while Professor Ko Sun-woo leads the AI Innovation Convergence College Project Group, specializing in deep learning and statistics. Other notable faculty include Professor Lee Geun-ho, the Director of Admissions, and Professor Min Jeong-ik, the Head of AI Graduate School, both contributing to various aspects of artificial intelligence education. Additionally, Professor Song Joo-hwan heads the Convergence Education Center, and Professor Kim Young-soo is the Department Head, both offering expertise in programming and data analysis.

data_entries.content_kr: 학과 관련 추천 도서 1. 십대가 알아야 할 인공지능과 4차 산업혁명의 미래 / 전승민 / 팜파스 2. 인공지능의 현재와 미래 / 나는 미래다 방송제작팀 / 보아스 3. 시간순삭 인공지능 with 스크래치 / 이재우 / 생능출판사.
data_entries.content:
Recommended books related to the field:  
1. The Future of Artificial Intelligence and the 4th Industrial Revolution That Teenagers Should Know / Jeon Seung-min / Pampas  
2. The Present and Future of Artificial Intelligence / I Am the Future Broadcasting Production Team / Boas  
3. Time-Slicing Artificial Intelligence with Scratch / Lee Jae-woo / Saengneung Publishing.
data_entries.summary: The recommended books in the field of artificial intelligence include "The Future of Artificial Intelligence and the 4th Industrial Revolution That Teenagers Should Know" by Jeon Seung-min, which explores AI's impact on the future, and "The Present and Future of Artificial Intelligence" by the I Am the Future Broadcasting Production Team, focusing on current trends and future possibilities in AI. Additionally, "Time-Slicing Artificial Intelligence with Scratch" by Lee Jae-woo offers a practical approach to understanding AI through programming with Scratch, making it accessible for younger audiences.

data_entries.content:
**Introduction to Major Courses for 1st Year:**

- **Course Name:** Python Programming and Practice  
  **Description:** Understand the basic concepts of computer programming and acquire fundamental Python programming skills to develop an understanding of computer programming and computational thinking.

- **Course Name:** Introduction to Probability and Statistics  
  **Description:** Introduce basic probability and statistics concepts frequently used in the field of artificial intelligence, and learn the introductory aspects of probability and statistics useful for creating machine/deep learning models.

- **Course Name:** Logical Problem Solving  
  **Description:** Learn various frameworks and logic trees for problem analysis and resolution to enhance problem-solving skills.

- **Course Name:** Image Processing  
  **Description:** Understand Digital Signal Processing and digital filters, and learn about digital signal processing of images and sounds, as well as Fourier transforms.

- **Course Name:** Foundation and Utilization of Artificial Intelligence  
  **Description:** Learn the history and foundational knowledge of artificial intelligence, along with its applications in various fields.

- **Course Name:** Artificial Intelligence Early Semester  
  **Description:** Introduce the basic concepts of linear algebra frequently used in artificial intelligence.

---

**Introduction to Major Courses for 2nd Year:**

- **Course Name:** Machine Learning  
  **Description:** Learn the basic concepts and algorithms of machine learning, including supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and ensemble models.

- **Course Name:** Deep Learning  
  **Description:** Practice the background knowledge of deep learning and the knowledge and applications related to Convolutional and Recurrent Neural Networks.

- **Course Name:** AI Algorithm  
  **Description:** Learn algorithms related to optimization and various techniques to find optimal solutions in artificial intelligence.

- **Course Name:** Data Analysis Basics  
  **Description:** Cover the fundamentals of data analysis and enhance practical skills by learning major open-source libraries (numpy, matplotlib, pandas).

- **Course Name:** Linux Operating System  
  **Description:** Understand the basic concepts and main functions of the Linux operating system, studying topics such as process management and storage management.

- **Course Name:** Problem Solving Algorithm  
  **Description:** Learn algorithms for solving story problems to enhance procedural problem-solving abilities.

- **Course Name:** Service Learning  
  **Description:** Apply learned theories to real corporate projects to gain practical experience and cultivate problem-solving skills.

- **Course Name:** Advanced Artificial Intelligence Mathematics  
  **Description:** Learn mathematical theories and techniques for developing artificial intelligence technologies, such as probability and statistics.

- **Course Name:** Basic Programming and Practice  
  **Description:** Develop foundational skills in object-oriented programming and software development using Java.

---

**Introduction to Major Courses for 3rd Year:**

- **Course Name:** AI Living Lab I  
  **Description:** Apply major knowledge to solve community problems and enhance practical problem-solving abilities.

- **Course Name:** Reinforced Learning  
  **Description:** Study and apply reinforcement learning, a core research area in machine learning and artificial intelligence.

- **Course Name:** Database  
  **Description:** Learn the concepts of databases, query languages, normalization, and object-oriented databases.

- **Course Name:** Basic Robot Programming  
  **Description:** Learn AI concepts necessary for robot control, as well as sensor data collection and processing.

- **Course Name:** Unsupervised Learning  
  **Description:** Learn the hidden structures of target-less data through unsupervised learning, including dimensionality reduction and clustering.

- **Course Name:** Web Programming  
  **Description:** Build a web programming environment using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Python.

- **Course Name:** Genetic Algorithm  
  **Description:** Learn methods to solve optimization problems through genetic algorithms and tabu search.

- **Course Name:** Natural Language Processing  
  **Description:** Learn the basic concepts and techniques of NLP based on Python and NLTK.

- **Course Name:** Advanced Neural Network  
  **Description:** Cover advanced neural network models and applications reflecting recent developments in deep learning.

- **Course Name:** Cloud Computing  
  **Description:** Learn the concepts of cloud computing, including virtualization, and study various operating systems in the cloud.

---

**Introduction to Major Courses for 4th Year:**

- **Course Name:** AI Living Lab II  
  **Description:** Apply major knowledge to solve community problems and cultivate practical problem-solving abilities.

- **Course Name:** Voice Recognition  
  **Description:** Learn the concepts of AI voice recognition, statistics, and digital signal processing.

- **Course Name:** Artificial Intelligence Seminar  
  **Description:** Study special topics in artificial intelligence and the latest developments and trends in related fields.

- **Course Name:** Artificial Intelligence System  
  **Description:** Implement artificial intelligence systems to deepen academic understanding.

- **Course Name:** Intelligence HCI  
  **Description:** Learn HCI technologies that improve interaction between humans and computers.

- **Course Name:** Knowledge Expression and Reasoning  
  **Description:** Learn logical expressions and reasoning techniques that can be
data_entries.summary: applied in artificial intelligence systems. The curriculum for the first year introduces foundational courses in programming, probability, logical problem solving, image processing, and the basics of artificial intelligence. The second year builds on this with machine learning, deep learning, data analysis, and practical applications through service learning. In the third year, students engage in advanced topics such as reinforcement learning, natural language processing, and database management, while also applying their knowledge in community projects. The final year focuses on specialized areas like voice recognition, AI systems, and human-computer interaction, culminating in a comprehensive understanding of artificial intelligence and its applications.

data_entries.content_kr: 전주대학교 인공지능학과에서 배우는 과목과 연계하여 도움이 되는 고등학교 과목으로는 정보, 인공지능 기초, 정보통신 전과목, 공학일반, 논리학, 생활과 창의성이 있습니다. 이러한 과목을 이수한 학생은 학과에서 제공하는 교육 과정에 보다 원활하게 적응할 수 있습니다.
data_entries.content: Subjects that are helpful in relation to the courses learned in the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University include Information, Basics of Artificial Intelligence, all subjects related to Information and Communication, General Engineering, Logic, and Life and Creativity. Students who have completed these subjects will be able to adapt more smoothly to the curriculum offered by the department.
data_entries.summary: Courses such as Information, Basics of Artificial Intelligence, Information and Communication, General Engineering, Logic, and Life and Creativity are beneficial for students in the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University. Completing these subjects helps students better adapt to the department's curriculum.

data_entries.content_kr: 전주대학교 인공지능학과의 설립일은 2021년입니다. 이 학과는 2021년도에 신설되었으며, 4차 산업혁명 시대를 선도할 인공지능(AI) 전문가를 양성하기 위해 개설되었습니다.
data_entries.content: The Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University was established in 2021. This department was newly created in 2021 to cultivate AI experts who will lead the era of the Fourth Industrial Revolution.
data_entries.summary: The Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University was established in 2021 with the aim of training AI experts to lead in the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

data_entries.content_kr: 2024년 기준으로 전주대학교 인공지능학과의 재학생 비율은 남학생 79%, 여학생 21%로 구성되어 있습니다. 이와 같은 재학생 비율은 AI 및 소프트웨어 관련 학과에서 흔히 볼 수 있는 경향을 반영하고 있습니다
data_entries.content: As of 2024, the student enrollment ratio in the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University consists of 79% male students and 21% female students. This enrollment ratio reflects a trend commonly seen in AI and software-related fields.
data_entries.summary: As of 2024, Jeonju University's Department of Artificial Intelligence has a student enrollment ratio of 79% male and 21% female, mirroring the typical gender distribution observed in AI and software-related disciplines.

data_entries.summary: The CSV content outlines various career paths in the data and AI fields, including roles such as Artificial Intelligence Developer, Machine Learning Engineer, Big Data Developer, Data Strategist, and Data Analyst. Each role involves specific responsibilities like designing systems, analyzing data, and optimizing performance, with a common requirement for foundational courses in Python programming and data analysis. Internships are emphasized as a key extracurricular activity, while certifications such as Google TensorFlow Developer and Big Data Analyst are highlighted as essential qualifications. Major employers in these fields include tech giants like Naver, Kakao, SKT, Samsung, Hyundai, and LG.

data_entries.content_kr: 전주대학교 인공지능학과에서 추천하는 학과 관련 도서로는 다음과 같은 책들이 있습니다. 1) '십대가 알아야 할 인공지능과 4차 산업혁명의 미래' (전승민, 팜파스), 2) '인공지능의 현재와 미래' (나는 미래다 방송제작팀, 보아스), 3) '시간순삭 인공지능 with 스크래치' (이재우, 생능출판사). 이 도서들은 인공지능의 기초 개념을 쉽게 이해하는 데 도움을 줍니다.
data_entries.content: The following books are recommended by the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University: 1) 'The Future of Artificial Intelligence and the Fourth Industrial Revolution That Teens Should Know' (Jeon Seung-min, Pampas), 2) 'The Present and Future of Artificial Intelligence' (I Am the Future Broadcasting Production Team, Boas), 3) 'Time-Slicing Artificial Intelligence with Scratch' (Lee Jae-woo, Saengneung Publishing). These books help in easily understanding the basic concepts of artificial intelligence.
data_entries.summary: The Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University recommends three books for understanding the fundamentals of artificial intelligence: 'The Future of Artificial Intelligence and the Fourth Industrial Revolution That Teens Should Know' by Jeon Seung-min, 'The Present and Future of Artificial Intelligence' by the I Am the Future Broadcasting Production Team, and 'Time-Slicing Artificial Intelligence with Scratch' by Lee Jae-woo. These resources aim to simplify the basic concepts of AI for readers.

data_entries.content_kr: 전주대학교 인공지능학과와 어울리는 사람은 인공지능 및 첨단기술에 관심이 많고, 창의성과 커뮤니케이션 능력을 갖추며, 도전 정신과 긍정적인 사고를 지닌 학생입니다. 이러한 역량을 갖춘 학생이라면 학과에서 제공하는 다양한 학습 기회를 잘 활용할 수 있습니다.
data_entries.content: The ideal person for the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University is a student who has a strong interest in artificial intelligence and advanced technologies, possesses creativity and communication skills, and embodies a spirit of challenge and positive thinking. A student with these qualities will be able to make the most of the various learning opportunities offered by the department.
data_entries.summary: The ideal candidate for the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University is a student with a keen interest in AI and advanced technologies, along with creativity, communication skills, and a positive, challenge-oriented mindset. Such qualities will enable the student to fully leverage the diverse learning opportunities provided by the department.

data_entries.content_kr: 전주대학교 인공지능학과의 장점으로는 전북권에서 유일하게 첨단분야 혁신융합대학 사업(AI 분야)에 선정된 점이 있습니다. 이를 통해 다양한 장학금 혜택과 해외 연수 기회가 제공되며, 인공지능을 체계적으로 배울 수 있는 최적의 교육 환경이 조성되어 있습니다
data_entries.content: One of the advantages of the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University is that it is the only institution in the Jeollabuk-do region selected for the Advanced Innovation Convergence University Project in the field of AI. This provides various scholarship benefits and opportunities for overseas training, creating an optimal educational environment for systematically learning artificial intelligence.
data_entries.summary: The Department of Artificial Intelligence at Jeonju University stands out as the sole institution in the Jeollabuk-do region chosen for the Advanced Innovation Convergence University Project in AI. This distinction offers students various scholarship benefits and opportunities for overseas training, fostering an ideal educational environment for comprehensive learning in artificial intelligence.

data_entries.summary: The CSV content lists elective courses offered to students in their 3rd and 4th years across two semesters, with each course carrying 3 credits. In the 1st semester of the 3rd year, there are seven electives including Database Systems and Machine Learning, while the 2nd semester offers six electives such as Deep Learning and Compiler. The 4th year includes seven electives in the 1st semester, including Distributed Systems and Digital Forensics, and five electives in the 2nd semester, featuring Blockchain Applications and Industrial Control System Security. Additionally, there is one required course, Information Security Capstone Design, in the 1st semester of the 4th year.

Key events include the start of the 1st semester on March 4, 2025, the midterm exams from April 21 to April 25, and the final exams from June 18 to June 24, with a summer session running from June 30 to July 24.

data_entries.summary: The Faculty of the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Chonnam National University includes several members with diverse research areas and laboratory affiliations. Key faculty members include Lim Hyeong-Seok, Choi Deok-Jai, and Kim Soo-Hyung, among others, each providing contact information and email addresses for communication. Research areas span from software languages and systems to biomechanics and robotics, with dedicated laboratories for augmented/virtual reality, security, game intelligence, and multimedia communication. The faculty's expertise reflects a broad spectrum of interests within the field of artificial intelligence.

/WEB-INF/jsp/k2web/com/cop/site/layout.jsp
aisw_JW_MS_K2WT001_S
계산이론연구실(Theory of Computation Lab.)
성 명 : 임형석 교수
위 치 : 공대7호관 354호
연락처 : 062-530-3426
이메일 : hslim@jnu.ac.kr
컴퓨터 분야에서 발생하는 문제들을 해결하기 위한 효율적인 알고리즘을 설계하고 분석하는 연구에 관심을 두고 있다. 현재 박사과정 3명과 석사과정 1명이 병렬컴퓨터를 위한 상호연결망의 설계와 분석, 그리고 생물정보학 분야의 염기서열 분석에 관한 연구를 진행하고 있다.
차세대네트워크연구실(Advanced Network Lab.)
성 명 : 최덕재 교수
위 치 : 공대7호관 446호
연락처 : 062-530-3429
이메일 : dchoi@jnu.ac.kr
새로운 패러다임인 유비쿼터스 컴퓨팅에 대해 연구하고 이를 실제화 한다. 정보를 감지하는 센서 계층, 정보를 수집, 분석 하고 서비스하는 미들웨어 계층, 이를 이용하는 유비쿼터스 응용프로그램 계층 등으로 구분하여 연구를 수행중이며, 인터넷 트래픽측정 및 엔지니어링, 망 운용 관리에 대해 연구를 수행중이다.
패턴인식연구실 (Pattern Recognition Lab.)
성 명 : 김수형 교수
위 치 : 공대7호관 349호
연락처 : 062-530-3430
이메일 : shkim@ jnu.ac.kr
인간의 사고 및 학습체계의 구현을 목적으로 하는 각종 인공지능기법 및 영상처리, 패턴인식 등에 관해 연구하고 있다. 또한 응용분야로써 자연영상 내 텍스트 추출, 문자인식, 키워드 검출, 부분 영상 매칭, 이동 물체 추적, 얼굴인식, 의료영상 등을 연구한다.
정보검색연구실 (Information Retrieval Research Lab.)
성 명 : 박혁로 교수
위 치 : 공대7호관 904호
연락처 : 062-530-3431
이메일 : hyukro@jnu.ac.kr
1999년 3월에 정보검색과 자연어 처리와 그 응용분야에 관하여 진취적이고 창조적인 연구를 수행하기 시작했다. 다가오는 21세기의 정보화 및 세계화 시대에 발맞추어 미래의 인간 중심 인터페이스와 지능형 컴퓨터를 개발하기 위한 핵심기술로 한국어를 처리할 수 있는 언어처리 기술에 관한 연구를 꾸준히 수행하고 있다. 21세기의 새로운 변화에 대처할 수 있고 두터운 기술의 장벽을 돌파할 수 있는 독창성을 함양한 훌륭한 인재를 육성하는 산실이 되고자 노력하고 있다.
스마트컴퓨팅연구실 (Smart Computing Lab.)
성 명 : 양형정 교수
위 치 : 공대7호관 906호
연락처 : 062-530-3436
이메일 : hjyang@jnu.ac.kr
홈페이지 : http://sclab.cafe24.com
데이터마이닝은 방대한 양의 데이터로부터 필요한 정보만 추출하거나 은닉된 지식을 탐색해냄으로써 데이터의 새로운 가치를 창출할 수 있는 분야로서 비즈니스 인텔리전트, 지식발견등으로도 알려져 있으며, 경영, 생명공학, 로봇지능 분야에 활용된다. 주요 연구분야는 데이터마이닝 기법으로 멀티미디어 데이터 사이의 상관관계를 발견하거나 패턴을 인식하여 예측과 분석에 이용하는 것이다.
분산네트워크시스연구실 (Distributed Network and Systems Lab.)
성 명 : 김경백 교수
위 치 : 공대6호관 715호
연락처 : 062-530-3438
이메일 : kyungbaekkim@jnu.ac.kr
본 연구실은 다양한 타입의 네트워크(유/무선 인터넷, 3/4G)위에서 구성되는 대규모 분산 네트워크와 시스템에 대해서 연구한다. 특히, 예기치 못한 상황에도 안정적으로 대처할 수 있고 다양한 보안상의 위협에도 효과적으로 대응할 수 있는 네트워크/시스템의 구조 및 전송 프로토콜을 디자인하고 개발한다. 최근, 온라인 소셜 네트워크 기반의 높은 보안성을 가지는 자격증명시스템과 높은 전송 성공률을 위한 대규모 메시지 시스템에 대해 연구를 진행중이다.
소프트웨어언어및시스템연구실(Software Languages and Systems Lab.)
성 명 : 최광훈 교수
위 치 : 공대7호관 442호
연락처 : 062-530-3421
이메일 : kwanghoon.choi@jnu.ac.kr
홈페이지 : http://swlab.jnu.ac.kr
프로그래밍언어, 컴파일러, 소프트웨어공학에 관한 전공 분야를 연구합니다. 특히 소프트웨어 버그를 줄이거나 제거하는 소프트웨어를 만드는 기술을 연구합니다. 1) 타입시스템을 기반으로 프로그래밍언어를 설계해서 원천적으로 버그를 허용하지 않도록 방지하고, 2) 프로그램을 실행하고 테스트하면서 버그를 찾고, 3) 마치 사람이 눈으로 살피듯이 프로그램 소스를 훑어보는 정적 프로그램 분석 기술로 실행하기 전에 버그를 찾는 기술을 연구합니다. 이러한 기술들을 모바일이나 사물인터넷과 같은 최신 컴퓨팅 환경에서의 소프트웨어 개발에 응용하는 프로젝트를 수행하고 있습니다.
휴먼-미디어연구실(Human-Media Lab)

성 명 : 유석봉 교수
위 치 : 공대6호관 712호

시각지능미디어연구실은 인공지능 심층 신경망 기반의 디노이징, 초해상도 등 초고화질 이미징 기술, 크라우드소싱 서비스를 위한 경량 DNN 기반 실시간 객체 검출 및 분류 기술, 스마트시티 서비스를 위한 영상정보 기반의 이동 객체 추적 및 행위 인식기술, 스마트교통/스마트그리드/빅데이터보안 등의 서비스에 적용할 수 있는 시각지능 관련 분야의 연구를 진행중이다.
컴퓨터비전연구실 (Computer Vision Lab.)
성명 : 조영준 교수
위치 : 공대7호관 329호
연락처 : 062-530-3432
이메일 : yj.cho@jnu.ac.kr
홈페이지 : https://sites.google.com/view/cvl-jnu
다중 카메라로부터 수집된 비디오에서 객체의 검출·추적 및 인식 기술을 연구한다. 특히 수 많은 객체들을 효율적으로 인식하기 위해, 장면에 포함된 다양한 시·공간적 정보를 활용한다. 또한 딥러닝 기반의 제품 품질 검수 시스템 (스마트팩토리), 의료 영상 분석, 인공지능 요소 기술에 대해서도 활발히 연구를 진행하고 있다.
증강·가상현실 연구실

보안/신뢰 컴퓨팅 연구실은 정보보안 환경에서 발생할 수 있는 각종 위협에 대응하기 위한 기술들을 연구한다. 특히 클라우드 및 네트워크 보안, 인공지능 보안, 트래픽 및 시스템 분석 등의 연구를 중점적으로 연구하고 있으며, 이들을 아키텍쳐 수준에서 개선하기 위해 소프트웨어 및 하드웨어를 모두 아우르는 범위에서 연구를 수행한다.
게임&기계지능 연구실 (Game and Machine Intelligence Lab.)
성 명 : 김만제 교수
위 치 : 공대 7호관 444호
연락처 : 062-530-4233
이메일 : jaykim0104@jnu.ac.kr
홈페이지 : https://sites.google.com/view/jaykim1224/
게임 및 기계지능 연구실에서는 강화학습과 진화 연산을 활용하여 게임이나 실세계의 다양한 문제를 해결하고 있습니다. 이 밖에도 게임과 실세계에서 활용할 수 있는 새로운 인공지능 개발과 기술을 연구하고 있습니다.
지능형 소프트웨어 진화 및 유지보수 연구실 (Software Evolution & Maintenance with Intelligence Lab)
성 명 : 김미수 교수
위 치 : 공과대학 7호관 443호
연락처 : 062) 530-4234
이메일 : misoo.kim@jnu.ac.kr
홈페이지 : https://sites.google.com/view/semi-jnu
소프트웨어 진화 및 유지보수에 필요한 작업들을 자동화하는 기법들을 연구한다. 세부 주제로는 유지보수에 필요한 자연어 텍스트(이슈/버그리포트 등)를 처리하는 기법, 소프트웨어 버그 마이닝 기법, 소프트웨어 결함과 버그를 자동으로 식별하고 수정하는 프로그램 디버깅 자동화 기법을 연구하고 있으며, 이를 위해 자연어 처리, 정보검색, LLM/LLMC, 프롬프트 공학등을 활용하고 있다.
data_entries.content:
/WEB-INF/jsp/k2web/com/cop/site/layout.jsp  
aisw_JW_MS_K2WT001_S  
Theory of Computation Lab.  
Name: Professor Lim Hyung-seok  
Location: Engineering Building 7, Room 354  
Contact: 062-530-3426  
Email: hslim@jnu.ac.kr  
Research interests include designing and analyzing efficient algorithms to solve problems in the field of computer science. Currently, three doctoral students and one master's student are conducting research on the design and analysis of interconnection networks for parallel computers and sequence analysis in the field of bioinformatics.  

Advanced Network Lab.  
Name: Professor Choi Deok-jae  
Location: Engineering Building 7, Room 446  
Contact: 062-530-3429  
Email: dchoi@jnu.ac.kr  
Research focuses on the new paradigm of ubiquitous computing and its realization. The research is divided into layers: a sensor layer that detects information, a middleware layer that collects, analyzes, and services information, and a ubiquitous application layer that utilizes these. Ongoing studies include internet traffic measurement and engineering, as well as network operation management.  

Pattern Recognition Lab.  
Name: Professor Kim Soo-hyung  
Location: Engineering Building 7, Room 349  
Contact: 062-530-3430  
Email: shkim@jnu.ac.kr  
Research involves various artificial intelligence techniques aimed at implementing human thought and learning systems, as well as image processing and pattern recognition. Application areas include text extraction from natural images, character recognition, keyword detection, partial image matching, moving object tracking, face recognition, and medical imaging.  

Information Retrieval Research Lab.  
Name: Professor Park Hyuk-ro  
Location: Engineering Building 7, Room 904  
Contact: 062-530-3431  
Email: hyukro@jnu.ac.kr  
Since March 1999, research has been conducted on information retrieval and natural language processing and their applications. In line with the upcoming information and globalization era of the 21st century, ongoing research focuses on language processing technology capable of handling the Korean language as a core technology for developing future human-centered interfaces and intelligent computers. The lab aims to nurture excellent talents with creativity capable of overcoming significant technological barriers and adapting to new changes in the 21st century.  

Smart Computing Lab.  
Name: Professor Yang Hyung-jung  
Location: Engineering Building 7, Room 906  
Contact: 062-530-3436  
Email: hjyang@jnu.ac.kr  
Website: http://sclab.cafe24.com  
Data mining is a field that creates new value from data by extracting necessary information or discovering hidden knowledge from vast amounts of data, also known as business intelligence and knowledge discovery, and is utilized in management, biotechnology, and robotic intelligence. The main research area involves discovering correlations between multimedia data using data mining techniques or recognizing patterns for prediction and analysis.  

Distributed Network and Systems Lab.  
Name: Professor Kim Kyung-baek  
Location: Engineering Building 6, Room 715  
Contact: 062-530-3438  
Email: kyungbaekkim@jnu.ac.kr  
This lab conducts research on large-scale distributed networks and systems configured over various types of networks (wired/wireless internet, 3/4G). In particular, it designs and develops network/system structures and transmission protocols that can stably respond to unexpected situations and effectively address various security threats. Recently, research has been ongoing on a high-security credential system based on online social networks and a large-scale messaging system for high transmission success rates.  

Software Languages and Systems Lab.  
Name: Professor Choi Kwang-hoon  
Location: Engineering Building 7, Room 442  
Contact: 062-530-3421  
Email: kwanghoon.choi@jnu.ac.kr  
Website: http://swlab.jnu.ac.kr  
Research is focused on programming languages, compilers, and software engineering. Specifically, the lab studies techniques for reducing or eliminating software bugs. This includes 1) designing programming languages based on type systems to inherently prevent bugs, 2) finding bugs through program execution and testing, and 3) researching static program analysis techniques that scan program source code as if a human were reviewing it to find bugs before execution. Projects are being conducted to apply these techniques to software development in modern computing environments such as mobile and the Internet of Things.  

Human-Media Lab  
Name: Professor Jeong Hee-yong  
Location: Engineering Building 6, Room 710  
Contact: 062-530-3427  
Email: h.jeong@jnu.ac.kr  
Website: https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Hieyong_Jeong  

Visual Intelligence Media Lab.  
Name: Professor Yoo Seok-bong  
Location: Engineering Building 6, Room
data_entries.summary: The text provides an overview of various research labs at a university, detailing the professors, their research interests, and contact information. The Theory of Computation Lab, led by Professor Lim Hyung-seok, focuses on efficient algorithms and interconnection networks, while the Advanced Network Lab, under Professor Choi Deok-jae, explores ubiquitous computing and network management. Other labs include the Pattern Recognition Lab, which investigates artificial intelligence techniques for image processing, and the Information Retrieval Research Lab, concentrating on natural language processing and Korean language technology. Additionally, the Smart Computing Lab works on data mining and multimedia data correlations, the Distributed Network and Systems Lab addresses large-scale network security, and the Software Languages and Systems Lab aims to reduce software bugs through innovative programming techniques.

data_entries.summary: Chonnam National University offers various laboratories within its Department of Artificial Intelligence, each led by a different professor. The laboratories include the Theory of Computation, Next Generation Network, Pattern Recognition, Information Retrieval, Smart Computing, Software Language and Systems, Security/Reliable Computing, Game & Machine Intelligence, and Augmented/Virtual Reality laboratories. Each laboratory has specific contact information, including phone numbers and email addresses for the respective professors.

인공지능학부 장학생 선발대상자는 아래의 항을 모두 만족한 자에 한한다.
① 인공지능학부 재학생이고 직전학기 평균평점이 3.0(실점 80점)이상인 학생(단, 9학기이상자는 대상자에서 제외)
② 직전학기에 최저 12학점 이상 이수해야 하며 인공지능학부 교육과정 중에서 6학점 이상 취득한 학생
제2조(반영요소 및 반영비율)
장학생 선발 시, 반영요소 및 반영비율은 아래와 같다.
직전 학기 평점(A)
자기계발 활동기록부(C)
기타 (상담, 참여도)(D)
계 (E=A+B+C+D)
위에 명시하지 않은 반영요소를 제외한 아래의 항목은 가산점을 부여할 수 있다.
① 자격증: 자격증은 본 학부 입학 후 취득한 자격증만 인정하며, 장학수혜여부와 상관없이 동일자격증은 장학사정에 1회만 반영한다. 단, 자격증 관련 가산점은 학부교수 회의를 통해 결정한다.
② 학과대표의 참여도에 가산점 2점을 부여 한다.
국가유공자 및 자녀 장학금, 북한 이탈 주민 및 자녀 장학금
창조장학금, 아동복지 청소년 장학금, 신입생 기초생활수급자 장학금, 장애학생 장학금, 농어촌학생전형 장학금
영호남교류학생장학금, 가족장학금
동행장학금(학업장려, 취업지원, 희망)
도전장학금(비상, 돋움, 자율, 미래)
대신장학금, 동원장학금, 기타 지정장학금
단과대학 자체지급 장학금
국가장학금(Ⅰ,Ⅱ유형, 다자녀장학금, 지방인재장학금), 국가우수장학금(이공계), 인문100년장학금, 대학원생지원장학금(인문사회계), 대통령과학장학금, 희망사다리장학금, 푸른등대기부장학금, 국가근로장학금
KRA와 함께하는농어촌희망장학

data_entries.content:
/WEB-INF/jsp/k2web/com/cop/site/layout.jsp  
aisw_JW_MS_K2WT001_S  
The candidates for the Artificial Intelligence Department scholarship must meet all of the following criteria:  
① Must be a current student in the Artificial Intelligence Department with a GPA of 3.0 (80 points) or higher in the previous semester (however, those in their 9th semester or beyond are excluded from eligibility).  
② Must have completed at least 12 credits in the previous semester and earned at least 6 credits from the Artificial Intelligence Department curriculum.  
Article 2 (Reflective Elements and Weighting)  
When selecting scholarship recipients, the reflective elements and their respective weights are as follows:  
Previous Semester GPA (A)  
Self-Development Activity Record (C)  
Others (Counseling, Participation) (D)  
Total (E = A + B + C + D)  
The following items, which are not specified above, may receive additional points:  
① Certifications: Only certifications obtained after admission to this department will be recognized, and the same certification will only be considered once in the scholarship evaluation, regardless of scholarship eligibility. However, additional points related to certifications will be determined through a faculty meeting.  
② An additional 2 points will be awarded for participation as a department representative.  
Scholarships for national merit and their children, scholarships for North Korean defectors and their children,  
Creative scholarships, youth welfare scholarships, scholarships for new students receiving basic living support, scholarships for students with disabilities, scholarships for rural students,  
Scholarships for exchange students from the Honam region, family scholarships,  
Scholarships for companionship (academic encouragement, employment support, hope),  
Challenge scholarships (emergency, growth, autonomy, future),  
Substitute scholarships, mobilization scholarships, and other designated scholarships,  
College-specific scholarships,  
National scholarships (Type I, II, multi-child scholarships, local talent scholarships), National Excellence Scholarships (for science and engineering), Humanities 100-Year Scholarships, Graduate Student Support Scholarships (for humanities and social sciences), Presidential Science Scholarships, Hope Ladder Scholarships, Blue Lighthouse Donation Scholarships, National Work-Study Scholarships,  
Rural Hope Scholarships in collaboration with KRA,  
Youth Startup Farmer Development Scholarships, Agricultural Food Talent Scholarships, Scholarships for Children of Farmers, Fisheries Successor Scholarships,  
Scholarships for the children of the Fire Department, among others, totaling over 10 types,  
Chonnam National University Alumni Association Scholarships, Gwangju Bank Scholarships, Future International Foundation, Lotte Scholarships, Mirae Asset Scholarships, Woobong Scholarships, Jeongsu Scholarship Foundation, Dongbu Foundation, Seongok Cultural Foundation, Kwanjeong Lee Jong-hwan Education Foundation Scholarships, and a total of over 140 types.
data_entries.summary: Candidates for the Artificial Intelligence Department scholarship must be current students with a GPA of 3.0 or higher from the previous semester, having completed at least 12 credits, including 6 from the department, while those in their 9th semester or beyond are ineligible. The selection process considers reflective elements such as GPA, self-development activities, and other contributions, with additional points available for certifications and departmental representation. Various scholarships are available, including those for national merit, North Korean defectors, and specific demographic groups, totaling over 140 types, including institutional and foundation scholarships.

data_entries.content:
Jeonnam National University Department of Artificial Intelligence Scholarship Information

[Eligibility]
- Current students in the Department of Artificial Intelligence with a GPA of 3.0 or higher in the previous semester (students with more than 9 semesters are excluded)
- Students who completed 12 credits or more in the previous semester and earned at least 6 credits in the Department of Artificial Intelligence curriculum

[Evaluation Criteria and Weights]
1. GPA from the previous semester (A)
2. Self-Development Activity Record (C)
3. Other Factors (counseling, participation, etc.) (D)
4. Total Score (E=A+B+C+D)

[Additional Points]
- Certifications: Only certifications obtained after enrollment in the department are recognized, and the same certification is counted only once.
- Participation as a department representative: 2 additional points awarded

[Other Scholarships]
- National Scholarships (Type I, II, Multi-Child Scholarship, Local Talent Scholarship)
- National Excellent Scholarship (for Science and Engineering), Humanities 100-Year Scholarship
- Graduate Student Support Scholarship (for Humanities and Social Sciences), Presidential Science Scholarship, Hope Ladder Scholarship
- Various external foundation scholarships (Gwangju Bank, Future International Foundation, Lotte Scholarship, etc.)
data_entries.summary: Jeonnam National University offers scholarships for students in the Department of Artificial Intelligence who maintain a GPA of 3.0 or higher and have completed at least 12 credits in the previous semester. Evaluation for the scholarship is based on GPA, self-development activities, and other factors, with additional points awarded for certifications obtained after enrollment and participation as a department representative. Other available scholarships include various national and external options, such as the National Excellent Scholarship and support from foundations like Gwangju Bank and Lotte Scholarship.

data_entries.content_kr:
﻿대학,학과(부),영역별/입학년도,졸업자격 인정기준,비고
AI융합대학,인공지능학부,전공영역,졸업논문 제출 - 전공프로젝트를 수행한 학생은 해당프로젝트에 관한 논문을 작성하여 지도교수의 확인을 받은 후 졸업에 대해 합격과 불합격이 판정된다.,
AI융합대학,인공지능학부,외국어영역,"- 아래의 기준 중 하나 이상 충족
(1) 정규 교육과정에 회화시간이 포함된 영어 교과목 이수자
(2) 생활영어1 또는 생활영어2 이수자.
(3) 외국어 공인시험에서 아래의 점수 이상을 취득한 자.
- TOEIC(영어) : 600점
TOEIC 이외의 공인 어학능력시험 점수는 TOEIC을 기준으로 환산하여 적용한다.",
AI융합대학,인공지능학부,장기수료생,"[장기수료자에 대한 졸업자격인정] 수료기간이 3년 이상인 수료자로서 다음에 해당하는 수료자에 대해서는 졸업자격을 인정할 수 있다.
- 취업 및 창업하여 졸업자격인정제도의 목적을 달성하였다고 볼 수 있는 수료자
[제출서류]
가. '졸업자격인정원'
나. 건강보험가입확인서 등 취업사실을 소명하는 증빙서류
다. 사업자등록증 등 창업 사실을 소명하는 증빙서류",
data_entries.content:
University,Department,Area/Admission Year,Graduation Qualification Criteria,Remarks  
AI Convergence University,Department of Artificial Intelligence,Major Area,Submit a graduation thesis - Students who have completed a major project must write a thesis related to that project and receive confirmation from their advisor, after which they will be evaluated as pass or fail for graduation.,  
AI Convergence University,Department of Artificial Intelligence,Foreign Language Area,"- Meet at least one of the following criteria:
(1) Completion of English courses that include conversation hours in the regular curriculum
(2) Completion of Practical English 1 or Practical English 2.
(3) Achieved the following scores on a foreign language proficiency test.
- TOEIC (English): 600 points
Scores from language proficiency tests other than TOEIC will be converted and applied based on TOEIC.",  
AI Convergence University,Department of Artificial Intelligence,Long-term Completion Students,"[Graduation Qualification Recognition for Long-term Completers] Graduation qualifications can be recognized for those who have completed their studies for 3 years or more and meet the following criteria:
- Completers who can be considered to have achieved the purpose of the graduation qualification recognition system through employment or entrepreneurship.
[Required Documents]
a. 'Graduation Qualification Recognition Application'
b. Proof of employment such as health insurance enrollment confirmation
c. Proof of entrepreneurship such as a business registration certificate",
data_entries.summary: AI Convergence University’s Department of Artificial Intelligence outlines graduation requirements for various areas, including a thesis submission for major projects, foreign language proficiency through specific course completions or TOEIC scores, and recognition of graduation qualifications for long-term students who have completed three years or more, provided they demonstrate employment or entrepreneurship through required documentation.

data_entries.content:
/WEB-INF/jsp/k2web/com/cop/site/layout.jsp  
aisw_JW_MS_K2WT001_S  
Train intelligent software professionals who can lead the future information society by educating them on the development of various intelligent applications based on software.  
Cultivate the ability to develop intelligent software such as machine learning and deep learning based on foundational mathematical knowledge. Additionally, provide education on applying artificial intelligence technologies in various fields such as image processing and natural language processing, with the goal of nurturing software and artificial intelligence professionals needed across industries.  
Nurturing talent with solid theoretical and practical knowledge  
Nurturing talent with a sense of responsibility and ethics as professionals  
Nurturing talent that can adapt to changing technological environments  
Samsung, LG, NAVER, DAUM, etc.  
Banks, securities firms, credit guarantee funds, etc.  
Samsung Electronics, LG Electronics, SK Hynix, LG Display, etc.  
Graduate schools, research institutes, professors, etc.  
Software-Centered University Project  
Artificial Intelligence Innovation Convergence University Project  
Information Security Specialization University Support Project
data_entries.summary: The text outlines a program aimed at training intelligent software professionals to lead in the information society by focusing on the development of intelligent applications and foundational knowledge in machine learning and deep learning. It emphasizes the importance of applying artificial intelligence technologies in various fields, such as image processing and natural language processing, to meet the industry's demand for skilled professionals. The program also aims to nurture talent with strong theoretical and practical knowledge, a sense of responsibility and ethics, and the ability to adapt to evolving technological environments. Partnerships with major companies and institutions, including Samsung and LG, highlight the program's relevance and support within the industry.

data_entries.content:
Introduction to the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Chonnam National University

[Educational Goals]
- Provide education for the development of various intelligent applications
- Cultivate skills in intelligent software development, including machine learning and deep learning
- Train specialized software and artificial intelligence professionals required by industries

[Types of Trained Professionals]
- Individuals equipped with both theoretical knowledge and practical skills
- Individuals with a sense of responsibility and ethics as professionals
- Individuals capable of adapting to changing technological environments

[Career Fields]
- Large corporations (Samsung, LG, NAVER, DAUM, etc.)
- Financial institutions (banks, securities firms, credit guarantee funds, etc.)
- Research institutes and academia (graduate schools, researchers, professors, etc.)

[Related Projects]
- Software-Centered University Project
- Artificial Intelligence Innovation Convergence University Project
- Information Security Specialized University Support Project
data_entries.summary: The Department of Artificial Intelligence at Chonnam National University aims to educate students in developing intelligent applications and cultivating skills in software development, particularly in machine learning and deep learning. It focuses on training professionals who possess both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, along with a strong sense of responsibility and ethics, enabling them to adapt to evolving technological landscapes. Graduates are prepared for careers in large corporations, financial institutions, and academia, supported by various related projects such as the Software-Centered University Project and the Artificial Intelligence Innovation Convergence University Project.

data_entries.content_kr:
경북대학교 IT대학 전자공학부 인공지능전공은 4차 산업혁명을 주도하는 AI 기술의 세계 최고 기술 경쟁력을 확보하고, 
AI 기반 기술 혁신을 이끌어갈 우수 인재 양성을 목표로 하고 있습니다. 
ICT 산업, 의료 등 전문 분야와 융합한 교육과 연구를 통해 창의적 실무형 인재를 기르는 동시에, 
차세대 AI 기술 개발에 핵심 역할을 담당할 고급 인재를 양성하여 글로벌 경쟁력 확보 및 지속 가능한 사회경제적 발전에 기여하고자 합니다.

본 전공은 부산대학교와 공동으로 운영되는 첨단 분야 공동 학과로, 
경북대학교에서는 전자공학부에, 부산대학교에서는 컴퓨터공학부에 소속되어 있습니다. 
이를 통해 학생들은 두 학교의 교수진으로부터 다양한 관점의 AI 교육을 받을 수 있습니다.

주요 연구 분야로는 지능형 통신 및 사물인터넷, 생성형 AI, 딥러닝 이론 및 응용, 뇌인지공학, 
컴퓨터 비전, 음성 및 언어 정보 처리 등이 있습니다. 

또한, AI 빅데이터 전문가 양성과정과 같은 프로그램을 통해 비전공자도 파이썬 기초 학습 후 본 교육과정을 수강할 수 있으며, 
팀 프로젝트 시 ICT 기업 참여 및 취업 연계 지원을 통해 현장에 바로 투입될 수 있는 특별한 기회를 제공합니다. 

이러한 교육과정을 통해 학생들은 인공지능 전문 역량 및 AI+X 융합 역량을 함양하여, 
사회 및 산업 각 분야에 AI 기술을 적용할 수 있는 인재로 성장할 수 있습니다.
data_entries.content:
The Department of Electronic Engineering with a Major in Artificial Intelligence at Kyungpook National University aims to secure the world's top technological competitiveness in AI technologies that lead the Fourth Industrial Revolution and to cultivate outstanding talents who will drive AI-based technological innovation. Through education and research that integrates specialized fields such as the ICT industry and healthcare, we aim to develop creative, practical talents while training advanced professionals who will play a key role in the development of next-generation AI technologies, contributing to global competitiveness and sustainable socioeconomic development.

This major is a joint program operated in collaboration with Pusan National University, with Kyungpook National University belonging to the Department of Electronic Engineering and Pusan National University belonging to the Department of Computer Engineering. This allows students to receive AI education from faculty members of both universities, gaining diverse perspectives.

Key research areas include intelligent communication and the Internet of Things, generative AI, deep learning theory and applications, brain cognitive engineering, computer vision, and speech and language information processing.

Additionally, programs such as the AI Big Data Specialist Training Course allow non-majors to take this curriculum after learning the basics of Python. Through team projects, we provide special opportunities for participation from ICT companies and employment linkage support, enabling students to be directly integrated into the field.

Through this curriculum, students can develop their expertise in artificial intelligence and AI+X convergence capabilities, growing into talents who can apply AI technologies across various sectors of society and industry.
data_entries.summary: The Department of Electronic Engineering with a Major in Artificial Intelligence at Kyungpook National University aims to enhance global competitiveness in AI technologies and cultivate skilled professionals for the Fourth Industrial Revolution. Collaborating with Pusan National University, the program offers students diverse educational perspectives in AI, focusing on areas like intelligent communication, generative AI, and deep learning. Additionally, it provides opportunities for non-majors through courses like the AI Big Data Specialist Training Course, fostering hands-on experience through team projects and industry partnerships. Ultimately, the curriculum prepares students to apply AI technologies across various sectors, contributing to technological innovation and socioeconomic development.

﻿혁신,학생들의 성취와 성과를 기반으로 실력에 따라 교육과정을 유동적으로 진행하는 교육을 통한 혁신 추구
혁신,"실무 현장을 고려한 융합 인공지능 교육과 연구, 산업체들과 제품단계의 협업을 통해 새로운 분야 개척 및 창업을 통한 일자리 창조"
융합,"학생, 교수 상호간 협력체계를 맺어 융합기술 수준을 높이는 Pair프로그램 진행을 통해 효율적이고 깊이 있는 역량강화 체계 구축"
융합,"지역의 중소기업들, 지자체들과의 교류를 통한 상호협력 네트워크 구축"
자율,자율적으로 연구 주제를 찾아 부족한 부분에 대해서는 타 분야 학생 및 교수들과 논의를 통해 발전할 수 있는 협업과 융합 연구 지원 및 장려
자율,"학생 주도적인 세미나와 스터디, 밋 업(meet up) 등의 활동을 장려하고 활동에 대한 인센티브 제공"

It emphasizes the pursuit of innovation through adaptive education and practical AI initiatives, the establishment of a competency enhancement system via the Pair program, and the creation of cooperative networks with local enterprises. Additionally, it highlights the support for autonomous research and encourages student-led activities to foster collaboration and engagement across disciplines.

인공지능을 전공함으로써 인공지능, 데이터사이언스, 소프트웨어 개발자, 머신러닝과 같은 핵심 AI 기술을 활용하여 많은 IT 전문분야로의 진출 가능
삼성전자, SK텔레콤, Naver, 카카오, LG전자, NC소프트 등 AI 관련 회사

data_entries.content:
Career Paths After Graduation

Industry / Research Institutes  
By majoring in artificial intelligence, there is the potential to enter various IT specialties utilizing core AI technologies such as artificial intelligence, data science, software development, and machine learning.  
AI-related companies include Samsung Electronics, SK Telecom, Naver, Kakao, LG Electronics, and NCSoft.  
AI-related companies also include Microsoft, Facebook, Adobe, IBM, and Google.  
As AI-related technologies are applied across all industrial sectors, the demand for graduates with a major in artificial intelligence is increasing even in non-IT companies.  
The demand for AI majors continues to grow across traditional industries such as healthcare, finance, automotive, new materials, robotics, pharmaceuticals, food, manufacturing, agriculture, energy, and construction.

Pursuing Graduate Studies and Academia  
Building on the foundational skills in artificial intelligence learned during the undergraduate program, students can advance to master's and doctoral programs to grow into key personnel leading research in AI core technologies.

Tech Startups  
Currently, AI talent in South Korea is concentrated in large corporations and specific sectors.  
By starting innovative venture companies utilizing AI technology, new fields can be pioneered.
data_entries.summary: Graduates majoring in artificial intelligence have diverse career opportunities in various IT specialties, including data science, software development, and machine learning, with increasing demand across multiple industries such as healthcare, finance, and manufacturing. Major companies in the AI sector include both local firms like Samsung and global giants like Microsoft and Google. Additionally, graduates can pursue advanced degrees to engage in research and development in academia. There is also potential for entrepreneurship in tech startups, allowing for innovation and the exploration of new fields using AI technology.

data_entries.content_kr:
학적부 정정 및 증명서 발급
[통합정보시스템-휴·복학 신청] 메뉴에서 직접 신청하고, 제출서류가 있는 경우 통합정보시스템에 첨부파일 업로드 기능을 활용하여 제출
※ 통합정보시스템에 첨부파일 업로드가 불가능한 경우: 학과(부)사무실에 직접 제출
창업휴학은 휴학원 및 관련 서류를 구비하여 창업교육팀(GP806)에 (☏950-2378) 제출 및 상담 필수
※ 휴학원 및 관련서류는 담당자에게 직접 제출(통합정보시스템 신청 불가)
통합정보시스템 바로가기
수업일수 4분의 2 이내
수업일수 4분의 3 이내
4주 이상 진단서 1부
수업일수 4분의 3 이내
임신, 출산 및 육아 등 관련 사실을 입증할 증빙서류
(단, 자녀의 나이 만8세까지 가능)
군입영통지서 사본 1 부
(입대 후는 군복무확인서)
수업일수 4분의 3 이내
(필수)사업자등록증 사본
(필수)창업휴학 신청원
									(필수)창업휴학 사업계획서
(해당자)성적증명서,
									(해당자)창업동아리증명서
(해당자)매출을 증빙할 수 있는 자료
학사과정: 6학기(약학대학은 8학기, 예과과정 3학기) 이내
※ 편입자: 3학기(단, 약학대학 편입자 6학기) 이내
석사과정 : 4학기(법학전문대학원 6학기) 이내
박사과정 : 6학기 이내
석·박사통합과정 : 8학기 이내(다만, 복합학위과정은 12학기 이내)
질병휴학, 육아휴학, 창업휴학은 각 4학기 간 추가로 휴학 가능
질병휴학은 한 학기 단위로 신청 가능
육아휴학은 자녀당 4학기 휴학 가능
재학 중인 학생으로 입대예정일이 수업일수 3/4선 이후라도 본인이 원하는 경우, 당해학기 수업일수 3/4선 이전에 입영통지서로 휴학신청을 할 수 있으며 이때 당해학기는 군입대 휴학이 됨
다만, 수업일수 3/4선이 경과한 후에는 당해학기 휴학신청이 불가하며 이러한 경우에는 선시험 등을 통하여 학점을 인정받은 후 휴학하여야 함
일반휴학 후 군휴학 시 입영일자가 수업일수 3/4선 이전이면 해당 학기는 군휴학 처리되며, 입영일자가 3/4이후면 해당 학기는 일반휴학 처리됨. 이 경우, 군휴학은 다음 학기부터 적용됨
군복무로 인한 휴학인정기간은 의무복무기간에 한하며, 의무복무 기간 이후에 개인적인 사정으로 인해 부사관 등으로 추가 복무하는 경우 해당 기간은 군휴학으로 처리되지 않으므로, 군제대 복학 신청 후 일반휴학을 추가로 신청해야 함
입학 후 첫학기는 휴학할 수 없음. 단, 다음에 해당하는 경우는 예외로 함.
군입대 휴학, 질병 휴학, 편입생 및 재입학생, 대학원생(연계과정 및 전문대학원생 제외), 기타 총장이 인정하는 특별한 경우
도전장학생은 장학생 선발 후 반드시 등록을 필하고 휴학원을 제출하시기 바라며 미등록 휴학시 장학금을 포기하는 것으로 간주됨(2013학번까지 해당됨)
창업휴학은 제출 서류의 1차 검토 후 위원회를 통해 휴학의 여부가 결정되오니 서류 제출은 위원회 일정(최소 2주 소요)을 고려하여 제출하기 바람
대학원생 창업휴학의 경우, 별도의 자격요건 안내를 위해 상담 전화 요망(☏950-2378)
창업휴학은 재학 중에만 신청 가능하므로 휴학생이 창업휴학신청을 하기 위해서는 반드시 복학기간 내에 복학 후 신청 가능함
※관련근거 : 학칙 제26조(휴학) 및 제27조(복학), 휴·복학 및 등록 업무 처리 지침, 경북대학교 창업교육학사제도 운영지침 제2장 창업휴학
[통합정보시스템-휴·복학 신청] 메뉴에서 직접 신청하고, 제출서류가 있는 경우 통합정보시스템에 첨부파일 업로드 기능을 활용하여 제출
※ 통합정보시스템에 첨부파일 업로드가 불가능한 경우: 학과(부)사무실에 직접 제출
휴학 기간 만료 또는 사유 종료 후 시작되는 다음 학기의 개강일 전(복학기간)
병적증명서 및 주민등록초본 등 군 전역을 증명할 수 있는 서류
귀향즉시 대학에 신고해야 하며 일반휴학 또는 복학해야 함
군제대 복학은 전역 후 1년(2개 학기)이내에 복학해야 함
예1)2019년 11월(2019학년도 2학기)에 제대한 경우, 2020학년도 2학기(복학기간)에는 반드시 복학해야 함
예2)2020년 3월(2020학년도 1학기)에 제대한 경우, 2021학년도 1학기(복학기간)에는 반드시 복학해야 함
※ 학기구분 제1학기 : 3월 1일부터 8월 31일까지, 제2학기 : 9월 1일부터 다음해 2월 말일까지
※ 관련근거 : 학칙 제26조(휴학) 및 제27조(복학), 휴·복학 및 등록 업무 처리 지침

Undergraduate program: within 6 semesters (8 semesters for the College of Pharmacy, 3 semesters for the pre-pharmacy program).  
※ Transfer students: within 3 semesters (6 semesters for transfer students in the College of Pharmacy).  
Master's program: within 4 semesters (6 semesters for the Law School).  
Doctoral program: within 6 semesters.  
Integrated master's and doctoral program: within 8 semesters (however, for complex degree programs, within 12 semesters).  
Leave of absence for illness, childcare, and startup can each be extended for an additional 4 semesters.  
Leave of absence for illness can be applied for in units of one semester.  
Leave of absence for childcare can be taken for 4 semesters per child.  
If a student who is currently enrolled has a military enlistment date after the 3/4 mark of class days, they may apply for leave of absence with the enlistment notice before the 3/4 mark of class days if they wish, and at that time, it will be considered a military leave of absence for that semester.  
However, after the 3/4 mark of class days has passed, applications for leave of absence for that semester are not possible, and in such cases, they must take exams or other means to earn credits before applying for leave of absence.  
If a student takes a general leave of absence and then a military leave of absence, if the enlistment date is before the 3/4 mark of class days, that semester will be processed as a military leave of absence, and if the enlistment date is after the 3/4 mark, that semester will be processed as a general leave of absence. In this case, military leave of absence will apply from the next semester.  
The period recognized for leave of absence due to military service is limited to the mandatory service period, and if additional service is performed for personal reasons, such as becoming a non-commissioned officer after the mandatory service period, that period will not be treated as military leave of absence, so a general leave of absence must be applied for after applying for readmission after military discharge.  
Students cannot take a leave of absence during their first semester after admission. However, the following cases are exceptions:  
Military enlistment leave of absence, leave of absence for illness, transfer students and readmitted students, graduate students (excluding linked programs and professional graduate students), and other special cases recognized by the president.  
Scholarship students must register after being selected and submit the leave of absence application; failure to register will be considered as forfeiting the scholarship (this applies to students enrolled until 2013).  
Startup leave of absence will be determined through a committee after the initial review of submitted documents, so please consider the committee schedule (at least 2 weeks required) when submitting documents.  
For graduate students applying for startup leave of absence, please consult by phone for separate qualification requirements (☏950-2378).  
Startup leave of absence can only be applied for while enrolled, so students on leave must return to school within the readmission period to apply for startup leave of absence.  
※ Relevant basis: Article 26 (Leave of Absence) and Article 27 (Readmission) of the Academic Regulations, Guidelines for Processing Leave of Absence and Readmission, Chapter 2 of the Guidelines for Operating the Startup Education System at
data_entries.summary: Students can apply for corrections to academic records and issuance of certificates through the Integrated Information System, with specific submission requirements for various types of leave of absence, including startup, illness, and childcare. For startup leave, applications must be submitted directly to the Startup Education Team, while other leave applications can be made through the Integrated Information System or directly to the department office if file uploads are not possible. The duration of leave varies by program, with specific rules for military leave and exceptions for first-semester students. Scholarship students must register and submit leave applications to maintain their scholarships, and startup leave applications require a committee review with a minimum two-week notice.

The initiative aims to position the university as a leader in training advanced professionals in AI and related fields. It will focus on specialized convergence areas, including AI in healthcare, law, and IT, to foster the development of practical skills and specialized knowledge essential for the evolving industrial landscape.
